subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Mark Sanchez began his career with the Jets riding high, but as the season has progressed, the highly touted first-round draft pick has struggled mightily and the Jets must decide what to do.
snippet: Mark Sanchez began his career with the Jets riding high, but as the season has progressed, the highly touted first-round draft pick has struggled mightily and the Jets must decide what to do.
